goals__remit:
ISKCON Communications Europe is the advocacy platform for ISKCON Europe. It strives to develop relationships and dialogue with many European Institutions especially the European Parliament, Commission, Council as well as NGO s and Religious Organisations. We follow and are interested in several topics and issues like: 
Religious Freedom 
Non Discrimination 
Environment 
Interfaith Dialogue 
Social Cohesion 
Rights of Women  
Rights of Minorities 
LGBT issues 
etc
relevant_communication:
We publish a Journal ISKCON Communications Journal and produce small brochures. This year we will organise an event in Brussels to launch our platform and next year we are planning a Conference on Religions and the Environment in Madrid Spain. We would also like to organise Conferences in the European Parliament on: 
Ayurveda 
Conversion 
Vegeterianism 
Religious Freedom of Hindus in South Asia an South East Asia 
etc
